item.title: Threonine
item.description: General Description Name Value Level S-1 / C-1 Discovered 1994 / C. salei Synonym Molecular formula C₄H₉NO₃ CAS 72-19-5 SMILES OC(C(N)C(O)C)=O InChI InChI=1S/C4H9NO3/c1-2(6)3(5)4(7)8/h2-3,6H,5H2,1H3,(H,7,8) Precursor 1 [M+H]⁺ 120.06552 Precursor 2 Precursor 3 HDX 4 Precursor HDX 1 [M(D₄)+D]⁺ 125.
